attrSubsurface.name: bssrdf
attrSubsurface.comment: 0 for NormalizedDiffuse, 1 for Dipole, 2 for random walk

attrScatteringRadius.name: scattering_radius
attrScatteringRadius.label: scattering radius
attrScatteringRadius.comment: the distance the light scatters beneath the surface. When 0 surface diffuse (lambertian or toon) is used

attrCreaseAttenuation.name: crease_attenuation
attrCreaseAttenuation.label: crease attenuation
attrCreaseAttenuation.comment: This mitigates the over-brightening around creases which random walk SSS can cause.

attrSubsurfaceTraceSet.name: sss_trace_set
attrSubsurfaceTraceSet.label: sss trace set
attrSubsurfaceTraceSet.comment: Set of geometries that contribute neighboring subsurface points. By default, only the geometry associated with this material contributes to subsurface. If you want adjacent geometry with different material to contribute as well, specify all those parts here.

attrEnableSubsurfaceInputNormal.name: enable_sss_input_normal
attrEnableSubsurfaceInputNormal.label: enable sss input normal
attrEnableSubsurfaceInputNormal.comment: enables sampling the normal map for sss samples. More accurate but potentially expensive

attrSSSResolveSelfIntersections.name: resolve_self_intersections
attrSSSResolveSelfIntersections.label: resolve self intersections
attrSSSResolveSelfIntersections.comment: tries to resolve self-intersecting geometry automatically by only evaluating 'exiting' intersections for subsurface evaluations
